original_text: Now there was an appointed sign between the men of Israel and the liers in wait, that they should make a great flame with smoke rise up out of the city.
korean_text: 처음에 이스라엘 사람과 복병 사이에 약속하기를 성읍에서 큰 연기가 치솟는 것으로 군호를 삼자 하고

sentences.original_text: Now there was an appointed sign
between the men of Israel and the liers in wait
that they should make a great flame
with smoke rise up out of the city
